Table	Create Table
drinks	CREATE TABLE `drinks` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `clientId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `drinkType` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `volumeMl` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `loggedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `calories` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `protein` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `fat` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `carbs` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `fibre` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `drinks_clientId_clients_id_fk` (`clientId`),
  CONSTRAINT `drinks_clientId_clients_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`clientId`) REFERENCES `CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q`.`clients` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=180001
